text: Identity () is a 1987 film by the Iranian director Ebrahim Hatamikia. Hatamikia also scripted the film, which starred Jalil Farjad. Set during the Iran-Iraq war, it is an example of Sacred Defense cinema.IMDb == Cast == == Production == ==References== category:Iranian films Category:1987 films Category:Persian-language films Category:Films directed by Ebrahim Hatamikia Category:Iran–Iraq War films Category:Iranian war films
title: Identity (1987 film)
